item.title: Report X-2024060936
item.description:
Report X-2024060936

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-20T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-13
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: FERNANDO HUIZAR, 134 OPERATIONS SUPERVISOR, ADVISED SAFETY OF A CHROMIC ACID SOLUTION SPILL ON THE DOCK AND TRAILER FLOOR. FERNANDO STATED THE SPILL WAS NOTICED WHILE UNLOADING THE TRAILER. FERNANDO ADVISED THE TWIST TOP LIDS WERE NOT CLOSED COMPLETELY RESULTING IN THE SPILL ON TOP OF THE FREIGHT RO SA WITH CURA WAS CONTACTED FOR REMEDIATION.
